General.Name: Shinwon
General.Description: ShinWon Corporation manufactures and sells men's wear, women's wear, casual, sports, and accessories in South Korea. Its owned women's wear brands include Besti Belli, SI, VIKI, and ISABEY; and men's wear brands comprise SIEG, SIEG Fahrenheit, Vanhart Di Albazar, and MARKM. The company also exports its products to the United States and Europe. It operates approximately 430 stores, as well as an online portal. ShinWon Corporation was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
